name: Ant King
description:
WASD and Mouse to move

Space to jump

R to restart

Esc to quit

Kinda became a meme speedrun game but hey, as long as people are having fun that's cool with me.

Special thanks to Razin Agida Kaharuba (Agid) for his incredible help. 

Also cheers to Dale Grant and Jordan Hamlin for their assists too.
